channel.title: anon-connection-wizard & AppArmor
channel.description:
Continuing the discussion from [[graphical gui] Whonix Setup Wizard / Anon Connection Wizard - Technical Discussion](http://forums.kkkkkkkkkk63ava6.onion/t/graphical-gui-whonix-setup-wizard-anon-connection-wizard-technical-discussion/650/398):
https://github.com/Whonix/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/pull/7
One thing I am not quiet sure: ```
- /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/ r, - /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/* r, + /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/ rw, + /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/* rw, ```
It seems we should give the write permissions, correct?

item.title: anon-connection-wizard & AppArmor
item.dc:creator: iry
item.description:
Continuing the discussion from [graphical gui] Whonix Setup Wizard / Anon Connection Wizard - Technical Discussion:

https://github.com/Whonix/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/pull/7

One thing I am not quiet sure:


-  /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/ r,
-  /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/* r,
+  /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/ rw,
+  /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/* rw,

It seems we should give the write permissions, correct?

Read full topic
